file.name: query-service.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: query-service API
  version: 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT
paths:
  /query-service/sendQuery:
    post:
      operationId: sendQuery
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/QueryRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
components:
  schemas:
    QueryRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        processInstanceId:
          type: string
        query:
          type: string
